Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Add missing status and totalSeconds fields to subtask API response

The /tasks/list and /tasks/:id endpoints were missing status and
totalSeconds fields in the subtask select query. This caused the
desktop app timer to show 00:00:00 and not increment, because
startTaskTracking\(\) couldn''t properly find pending subtasks or
restore accumulated time.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Task hourlyRate fallback when User hourlyRate = 0

When user''s hourlyRate is not set \(0\), use the highest hourlyRate from
the tasks/subtasks that have TimeLogs in the period. Also updated
_debug diagnostics to show effectiveHourlyRate and fallback status.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
